select
from KDI_SYS_PLATFORM_LOG a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startCreateTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endCreateTime},'%Y%m%d')
